name: Spray deodorant
title: Axe Africa · Spray deodorant · 48h, 0% aluminum salts
description: Axe Spray deodorant 48h, 0% aluminum salts For explorers and adventurers

cosmeticInformation.ingredients: Ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Butane, Isobutane, Propane, Parfum, Zinc Neodecanoate, Isopropyl Myristate, Citronellol, Coumarin, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool.

usageInformation.additionalInformation: Effective protection against body odor. The world is full of surprises and adventure. And the best part is that you can experience them all yourself. We are more mobile than ever and attractive and mysterious destinations are waiting to be explored all over the world. Adventures have to be completed, new friendships are always being made. Connection after connection is made around the world. For a world of new connections, AXE Africa has been created with its exciting masculine fragrance. It has been one of the most popular body sprays for over a decade now, combining effective AXE protection against body odor with a wonderful, exotic scent developed by the world's best fragrance experts. Completely without aluminum, AXE Africa protects its wearer so effectively that they can always count on their attractive appearance. The fragrance is exotically composed while impressing with its sophisticated character. The masculine base of cedar wood, sweet amber, musk and African spice notes forms a passionate union with the lively top note. Here, fresh citrus fruits and sensual-floral scents such as lavender and rosemary provide elegance. In combination, the result is a fragrance that stimulates all the senses and at the same time protects against unpleasant odors safely and with absolutely no aluminum. Simply spray the AXE Body Spray on the free upper body, that's it! AXE Africa is the effective body spray with the exotic scent that tells of a curious personality that is at home anywhere in the world.

remarks.value: WARNHINWEISE: Aus nicht weniger als 15 cm Entfernung sprühen. Nicht auf gereizter oder verletzter Haut anwenden. Bei Auftreten von Hautirritationen nicht weiter verwenden. Direktes Einatmen vermeiden. Nur kurz sprühen und in gut gelüfteten Räumen verwenden, längeres Sprühen vermeiden. Kontakt mit Augen und Intimbereich vermeiden. Benutzung ausschließlich gemäß Verwendungszweck. Nur entleert entsorgen.
